mapper.insert: insert into favorite_place (content_no, user_no, registration_date) values (#{contentNo}, #{userNo}, now())
mapper.select: select s.sido_name 'name', count(f.favorite_no) 'likeCnt' from favorite_place f, attraction_info attr, sido s where f.content_no = attr.content_no and floor(attr.loc_no/1000) = s.sido_no group by s.sido_name order by count(f.favorite_no) desc

select att.content_no 'contentNo', att.title 'title', att.addr1 'addr', att.first_image 'imgsrc' from favorite_place fav, attraction_info att, sido s where fav.content_no = att.content_no and floor(att.loc_no/1000) = s.sido_no order by fav.registration_date desc limit 5
mapper.insert: insert into attraction_comment (content_no, content, createtime, user_no) values (#{contentNo}, #{content}, now(), #{userNo})
